name: Johanniter International
goal: Johanniter International (JOIN) is the partnership of the national charities originally founded by the Orders of St John. Our members share a common approach to humanitarian welfare and social aid based on our Christian heritage. We serve humanity with emergency medical services and first aid, social care, international aid, training and youth work. We share our skills and resources to achieve more. We work with volunteers and employees to care for people in need in everyday life and in times of crisis. Our services and support are open to everyone.
interests: Borders and Security, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, European Neighbourhood Policy, External Relations, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Migration and asylum, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Sport, Youth
euInitiatives: Humanitarian Aid, Volunteering, Health & Safety regulations, HORIZON 2020, AAL Programme, Erasmus Plus, etc.
